colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(ZHES 'DI YANG CHOS SKYONG CHEN PO DGRA LHA HANGK'A RGYAL PO 'KHOR BCAS LA MCHOD GTOR 'BUL BA'I RIM PA DGOS 'DOD 'BYUNG BA'I MNA' BRAL DPAG BSAM 'KHRI SHING ZHES BYA BA, 'DI NI GU RU SA M'AD'A NA RJE BTZUN @009B RNAL 'BYOR MA DE NYID KYI 'KHOR MTHA' GTAN NAS DBEN PA'I BKA' DRIN CHES LCI BA'I DRIN CHEN GYIS KHO BO CAG GI GZIGS SNANG LA SNGA MO NAS CHOS SKYONG CHEN PO 'KHOR BCAS KYIS, YANG DANG YANG DU GSAL LE BAR 'BYUNG STE THUB BSTAN RIN PO CHE DANG, KHYAD PAR KHYOD KYI BSTAN PA'I BSRUNG MA DENG CHO NGES PA RANG YIN ZHES BKA' SPYI BOR 'BEBS PA DANG, BLA MA RJE BTZUN MAS KHYOD KYIS DE NYID KYI GSOL MCHOD KYI RIM PA RNAMS 'DI BZHIN DU BRIS SHIG CES BKA' ZLOG TU MED PA YANG DAG PAR PHEB PA LA BRTEN NAS, RIG 'DZIN TE DZVA BADZRAS YIG RNYING GAR LA'ANG MA LTOS PAD DANG RKANG 'DZUGS TE RANG BZOS MA BSLAD PAR RJE BTZUN MA'I DRIN GYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS MTSON RAB DKAR ZLA SHEL GYI DGE BA'I SNANG BA CHEN POS SA GSUM GYI MI SHES PA'I RGUD MUN MA LUS PA GTAN NAS SEL ZHING, RAB 'BYAMS PHYOGS PHYOGS ZHING KHAMS THAMS CAD DU RGYAL BA'I SDIG SEL RIN PO CHE BRTAS BAR BYED PA PO KHO BO CAG GIS MYUR DU GYUR TEE, MKHAR NYAL DANG YID SKYES LA SOGS LA 'GRO BA MANG PO'I STON PA BLA NA MED PA DANG SHIN TU MTSUNGS PA NYID DU PHYIN TE MA RGAN SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYI RE BA MA LUS PA YONGS SU SKONG BAR GYUR CIG ,MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
